definitions.title: vb. Pi. denom.
definitions.body: draw in outline, trace out;—Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְתָֽאֲרֵ֫הוּ]] Is 44:13, Is 44:13 (both c. [[ב]] instr.), of shaping idols; for MT 2 mpl. [[תְּתָאוּ]] Nu 34:7, Nu 34:8 Che:Ency. Bib. 2109 prop. [[תְּתָאֲרוּ]] ye shall trace out (the boundary; with [[וְתֵאַרְתֶּם]] for [[וְהִתְאַוִּיתֶם]] v:Nu 34:10); v. also [[תאה]], [[תוה]]. p. 1060, 1063
